item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: These are my awesome (actually horrible) dotfiles. Screenshots are located in the imgs folder and shown in README’s. This is a web version of the README. Go to the dotfiles repository for more things. Caution: Changing stuff to make it work/fit your needsYou probably will and must change something in my dotfiles. I recommend looking through these dotfiles and changing things to fit your setup and/or needs if you want to use this.

item.title: Media Stuff
item.description: List of media that I am currently consuming/planning to consume/consumed. Everything is sorted alphabetically and are ordered by status like this: Watching/Playing -> Infinitely Playing (games only) -> On Hold -> Plan To Watch/Play -> Completed.
